description: This file defines a React functional component called Layout, which serves as a reusable layout wrapper for application views. It includes structure for a viewport, status bar, app bar with optional back button, title, and right slot, plus a main content area.

methods.name: Layout({ title, showBack = false, rightSlot = null, children })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a layout with optional back button, title, right slot, and main content.

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Layout({ title, showBack = false, rightSlot = null, children }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ title, showBack = false, rightSlot = null, children })
